name: BotSupport
description:
Congratulations. It's your first day as a BotSupport agent at the respectable Northland Facility.

Your job is to help the unstable robots calling in and restore them to perfection.

But wait... Something is not quite right. What is wrong with the elevator? And what happened to Jessica?

**Something mysterious is going on...**

Minor Spoiler Alert 

There are 4 unique endings to the game. I will list the names for incentive and for you to track your progress.

  • 1 / 4 - Elevated Life-form
  • 2 / 4 - You waste my time, I waste yours
  • 3 / 4 - Jessica Rescued? - True ending
  • 4 / 4 - Man-to-man, man-to-floor
